body: Miyata, the MC, was in baseball club, but he recently retire from injury and is just wasting time in the library. He saw Inobe, the librarian, and seeing her big boobs, tried to approach her thinking he might have a chance to fuck her. But the books she recommended are actually fun, and they naturally grew closer. He spend more time helping her in the library too. One day, he tried asking her about how her recommendation usually got sex scenes, and if she likes them. Well, he forced himself on her, but Inobe is also a masochist, so they have a steady fuck buddy relationship after what happened. Miyata thought of her as his sex toy, but he also felt like not only she likes it, she actually wants more. Recently, he also realized he is asking how she felt after sex, as if he actually works to make her feel good rather than just using her for his own pleasure. | The pattern I love. Starts like a rape, but the guy actually fallen for the girl too. ^-^
